alert.note: Alert for Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 9:27AM EDT until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Trent River At Pollocksville affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trent River At Pollocksville. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Water floods property and some out buildings on Hughes Plantation Road. Water also inundates the Pollocksville boat launch area. At 5.5 feet, Water inundates low portions of Oak Grove Road near the bridge, and the roadway is likely impassable. Portions of Simmons Bluff Lane are also covered by water, and may be impassable. Extensive flooding of the Pollocksville boat launch area is expected as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM EDT Thursday was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river may remain in flood stage at this location for several days as freshwater moves downstream and northeast winds keep water levels high at the mouth. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 1230 AM EDT.
